div.div: The projected spatial extent of inundation due to SLR and annual flooding due to the combined effects of waves and SLR on Roi through time for different SLR and climatic scenarios.
div.p: ( A) SLR inundation for RCP4.5. ( B) SLR inundation for RCP8.5. ( C) SLR inundation for RCP8.5+icesheet collapse. ( D) Annual wave-driven flooding for RCP4.5. ( E) Annual wave-driven flooding for RCP8.5. ( F) Annual wave-driven flooding for RCP8.5+icesheet collapse. The overwash extents during annual large wave events increase into the future because of SLR and with increasing RCP scenario; the island is completely overwashed annually by wave-driven flooding later in the 21st century for RCP8.5 scenarios.
